channel.title: Help with testscape
channel.description: i just got it... i am going to start a server... and when i run it it says: [code] 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] can someone help me?

item.title: Help with testscape
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

when i compile is this what it should say?

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
autospawn.cfg: file not found.
autospawn2.cfg: file not found.
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Read full topic

item.title: Help with testscape
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Get Jdk 5 Update 9 And a Jre (may be a different name I think it is 2-3 under the Jdk)
Link: Java Downloads

And for what l0l l0rd said. Let me fix up what he said:
Ok,

Check what Jdk and Jre you have. By going to ‘Start’>‘Run’ And typeing in this (no quotes) “C:/program files/java”

Then put this in your compiler: (If yo find you have Jdk1.5.0_09 and Jre1.5.0_09 (if not get from the above link ^^)

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pause

Then this goes in your runserver:

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME server java -cp .;./jython.jar server

Or try this if above doesn’t work:

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Hope this helps you and good job trying to help l0l l0rd

Read full topic

item.title: Help with testscape
item.dc:creator: @l0l_l0rd l0l l0rd
item.description:
@l0l_l0rd wrote:

hello i had the same problem as you so 1st off make sure you have both versions of java jdk and jre

do this by going into run and typing ‘‘C:/program files/java’’

second off edit your compile file and paste in this.

@echo off
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe” server
pause

AND HAVE THIS IN YOUR RUN.BAT

java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
pause

I hope this helps and if you could give me some rep that would be great

Read full topic
